title: PopCult
description: A site for film & series lovers!
admin_reports_description: Here you can see every report sent and accept or decline them.
admin_bans_description: Here you can see and manage every banned user.
admin_mods_description: Here you can see every active moderator and requests made to become a moderator as well.
profile_description: Or as we like to call you: <0>{{username}}</0>
settings_description: Or as we like to call you:
settings_image_error:
It seems that your image is too big,
or for some reason can't be uploaded at the moment.
Please try again.
username_error:
Valid usernames contain between 1 and 20
non special characters.
name_error:
Valid names contain between 3 and 20
non special characters.
login_sign_up: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login_error: Incorrect username or password. Please, try again.
register_email_validation:
Please insert a valid email. 
For example: something@example.com
register_password_error: Please insert a valid password. Tap ? for more details
register_password_hint:
Your password must be 8-20 characters long,
contain letters and numbers, and must not contain
spaces, special characters, or emoji.
register_username_error: Valid usernames contain between 1 and 20 non special characters.
register_name_error: Valid names contain between 3 and 20 non special characters.
